name: tm04
effect: Teaches Calm Mind to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Calm Mind to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Rollout Gen I: Whirlwind)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind.
flavor_text.emerald: Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user focuses its mind to raise the SP. ATK and SP. DEF stats.
